Responsive web, Mobile and applicaiton provider.  We provide companies a complete mobile first strategy for marketing and management of interactive online visitor and customer engagement..  Offering a industry first platform and solution set for customers, advertising agencies and marketing teams by providing award winning design, development, and management solutions and tools.  With our mobiPlatform and integrated data solutions customers can integrate directly with any existing CRM or CMS system as well as control all of their online assets from web, mobile, tablet and applications.  With one of the fastest times to market and overall ROI and cost of implementation in the industry, mobiManage helps customers engage their mobile customer quickly and affordably.
Manager/Owner-  Managed day to day marketing and online solutions.
Lesson learned.  Even if the people you are in business with don't do whats right .. follow your heart, do what you know is right and treat people good it will pay off in the end.

summary: President and CEO for mobiManage. mobiManage is a leading interactive provider of touchscreen, display, mobile and application services. Primary markets are focused in Travel and Tourism, Hospitality, Retail and Real Estate industries. Currently focused on efforts to expand our reach into the Global Marketplace with new offices in Asia and Mexico.mobiManage already has an impressive track record with Fortune 500 companies and destinations all over the world, with over 500 web, mobile and application products developed and marketed for many different verticals. Responsive web solutions and integrated applications services managed out of our Content Marketing System platform allows organizations to easily integrate any existing system, CRM or data feed into all interactive solutions. Existing web, app or kiosk solutions can be integrated and managed out of our cloud-based system, providing one cloud-based marketing management tool. Our robust suite of marketing tools help set our clients apart from the rest. Geo-Marketing and Proximity Marketing with iBeacons, Push Notifications, and Cisco WiFi partnerships help businesses connect with app users and mobile visitors in the most personal, targeted way. Specialties Include:- Marketing Management CRM Platform- Responsive Web Design- Custom Mobile and Tablet Microsites & Websites- Mobile Application Development  (iPhone, iPad, Android, Blackberry, Windows)- Integration of Customer Relationship Management (CRM)- Interactive Mobile Marketing- Mobile Marketing Consulting- Software Development .NET, PHP, HTML 5, JAVA, .Net, ASP, etc.
name: Douglas Ralston
title: Entrepreneur and Technology Professional in the Touchscreen, Display, Mobile and Application Software Marketplace
